attributes.action: take immediate steps to prevent the MPs second home allowance from becoming a grant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These allowances are a topic which the public (THOSE WHO PAY FOR IT) does NOT want to go away.  We, the paymasters, have the right to know where our money is going and why taxes can be used by MPs to pay the BBC Licence Tax yet taxpayers can't set it against THEIR annual income tax bill, for instance.  Taxpayers MUST retain the right of oversight on any expenditure of public funds.  To deny the taxpayer that is to remove a fundamental human right.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
